text: Parasitengona larvae on a specimen of Monoscutum (Opiliones) Parasitengona is a group of mites, variously ranked as a suborder or a cohort, between the taxonomic ranks of order and family. Members of Parasitengona include velvet mites, chiggers, and water mites. https://entomologytoday.org/2020/05/28/ray- fisher-acarologist-mites-standout-early-career-professional ==References== Category:Trombidiformes
title: Parasitengona
